original_title: アンジュルムFCイベント2019 ～Angermerry Xmas～
overview: ANGERME FC Event 2019 ~Angermerry Xmas~ (アンジュルムFCイベント2019 ～Angermerry Xmas～) was ANGERME's Christmas 2019 fanclub event. Two shows took place on December 20, 2019 at Yamano Hall.  The deadline to pre-order the fanclub-exclusive DVD was on February 27, 2020 and it was released to fanclub members on April 25, 2020.
title: ANGERME FC Event 2019 ~Angermerry Xmas~
